<ce:section-title id="sect0040">Preparation of [Zn(22dmg)(dpa)]<ce:italic>
<ce:inf loc="post">n</ce:inf>
</ce:italic> (1)</ce:section-title><ce:para id="p0040" view="all">Zn(NO<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>·6H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O (83 mg, 0.28 mmol), dpa (48 mg, 0.28 mmol), and 2,2-dimethylglutaric acid (62 mg, 0.28 mmol) were mixed with 10 mL of distilled H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O and 0.55 mL of 1 M NaOH in a 23 mL Teflon-lined acid digestion bomb. The bomb was sealed and heated in an oven at 120 °C for 48 h, and then was cooled over a 3 h period to ambient temperature. Colorless crystals of <ce:bold>1</ce:bold> (25 mg, 23% yield based on Zn) were obtained after washing the reaction product on a Büchner funnel with distilled water, ethanol, and acetone, and then finally drying in air for one hour. Anal. Calc. for C<ce:inf loc="post">17</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">19</ce:inf>N<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">4</ce:inf>Zn <ce:bold>1</ce:bold>: C, 51.72; H, 4.85; N, 10.65% Found: C, 51.66; H, 4.68; N, 10.80%. The bomb was sealed and heated in an oven at 120 °C for 48 h, and then was cooled over a 3 h period to ambient temperature. Colorless crystals of <ce:bold>2</ce:bold> (20 mg, 18% yield based on Zn) were obtained after washing the reaction product on a Büchner funnel with distilled water, ethanol, and acetone, and then finally drying in air for one hour. Anal. The bomb was sealed and heated in an oven at 120 °C for 48 h, and then was cooled over a 3 h period to ambient temperature. Colorless crystals of <ce:bold>3</ce:bold> (60 mg, 54% yield based on Zn) were obtained after washing the reaction product on a Büchner funnel with distilled water, ethanol, and acetone, and then finally drying in air for one hour. </ce:italic> (4)</ce:section-title><ce:para id="p0055" view="all">Cd(NO<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>·4H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O (86 mg, 0.28 mmol), dpa (48 mg, 0.28 mmol), and 3,3-dimethylglutaric acid (62 mg, 0.28 mmol) were mixed with 10 mL of distilled H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O and 0.55 mL of 1 M NaOH in a 23 mL Teflon-lined acid digestion bomb. The bomb was sealed and heated in an oven at 120 °C for 72 h, and then was cooled over a 3 h period to ambient temperature. Colorless crystals of <ce:bold>4</ce:bold> (57 mg, 46% yield based on Cd) were obtained after washing the reaction product on a Büchner funnel with distilled water, ethanol, and acetone, and then finally drying in air for one hour. Anal. Calc. for C<ce:inf loc="post">17</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">19</ce:inf>CdN<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">4</ce:inf>
<ce:bold>4</ce:bold>: C, 46.32; H, 4.34; N, 9.51% Found: C, 45.97; H, 4.50; N, 9.73%. IR (cm<ce:sup loc="post">–1</ce:sup>): 1563 (s), 1525 (s), 1443 (m), 1389 (m), 1358 (s), 1283 (w), 1214 (s), 1168 (w), 1110 (w), 1013 (s), 953 (w), 907 (m), 812 (s), 727 (m), 662 (m).</ce:para>
clean_text:
Preparation of [Zn(22dmg)(dpa)] n  (1)

Zn(NO3)2⋅6H2O (83mg, 0.28mmol), dpa (48mg, 0.28mmol), and 2,2-dimethylglutaric acid (62mg, 0.28mmol) were mixed with 10mL of distilled H2O and 0.55mL of 1M NaOH in a 23mL Teflon-lined acid digestion bomb. The bomb was sealed and heated in an oven at 120°C for 48h, and then was cooled over a 3h period to ambient temperature. Colorless crystals of 1 (25mg, 23% yield based on Zn) were obtained after washing the reaction product on a Büchner funnel with distilled water, ethanol, and acetone, and then finally drying in air for one hour. Anal. Calc. for C17H19N3O4Zn 1: C, 51.72; H, 4.85; N, 10.65% Found: C, 51.66; H, 4.68; N, 10.80%. IR (cm-1): 1576 (s), 1513 (s), 1447 (m), 1377 (w), 1342 (m), 1250 (w), 1211 (s), 1063 (s), 1026 (s), 944(m) 827 (s), 681 (m).

Preparation of [Zn(33dmg)(dpa)] n  (2)

Zn(NO3)2⋅6H2O (83mg, 0.28mmol), dpa (48mg, 0.28mmol), and 3,3-dimethylglutaric acid (62mg, 0.28mmol) were mixed with 10mL of distilled H2O and 0.55mL of 1M NaOH in a 23mL Teflon-lined acid digestion bomb. The bomb was sealed and heated in an oven at 120°C for 48h, and then was cooled over a 3h period to ambient temperature. Colorless crystals of 2 (20mg, 18% yield based on Zn) were obtained after washing the reaction product on a Büchner funnel with distilled water, ethanol, and acetone, and then finally drying in air for one hour. Anal. Calc. for C17H19N3O4Zn 2: C, 51.72; H, 4.85; N, 10.65% Found: C, 51.95; H, 5.14; N, 11.10%. IR (cm-1): 2959 (w), 1595 (s), 1514 (s), 1447 (w), 1347 (s), 1249 (m), 1210 (s), 1116 (w), 1067 (m), 1023 (s), 942 (m), 820 (s), 784 (w), 747 (w), 671 (s).

Preparation of [Zn(3mad)(dpa)] n  (3)

Zn(NO3)2⋅6H2O (83mg, 0.28mmol), dpa (48mg, 0.28mmol), and 3-methyladipic acid (62mg, 0.28mmol) were mixed with 10mL of distilled H2O and 0.55mL of 1M NaOH in a 23mL Teflon-lined acid digestion bomb. The bomb was sealed and heated in an oven at 120°C for 48h, and then was cooled over a 3h period to ambient temperature. Colorless crystals of 3 (60mg, 54% yield based on Zn) were obtained after washing the reaction product on a Büchner funnel with distilled water, ethanol, and acetone, and then finally drying in air for one hour. Anal. Calc. for C17H19N3O4Zn 3: C, 51.72; H, 4.85; N, 10.65% Found: C, 51.47; H, 5.14; N, 10.36%. IR (cm-1): 1567 (w), 1521 (s), 1392 (s), 1351 (s), 1312 (w), 1207 (s), 1062 (w), 1024 (s), 943 (m), 906 (s), 818 (s), 723 (w), 676 (m).

Preparation of [Cd(33dmg)(dpa)] n  (4)

Cd(NO3)2⋅4H2O (86mg, 0.28mmol), dpa (48mg, 0.28mmol), and 3,3-dimethylglutaric acid (62mg, 0.28mmol) were mixed with 10mL of distilled H2O and 0.55mL of 1M NaOH in a 23mL Teflon-lined acid digestion bomb. The bomb was sealed and heated in an oven at 120°C for 72h, and then was cooled over a 3h period to ambient temperature. Colorless crystals of 4 (57mg, 46% yield based on Cd) were obtained after washing the reaction product on a Büchner funnel with distilled water, ethanol, and acetone, and then finally drying in air for one hour. Anal. Calc. for C17H19CdN3O4 4: C, 46.32; H, 4.34; N, 9.51% Found: C, 45.97; H, 4.50; N, 9.73%. IR (cm-1): 1563 (s), 1525 (s), 1443 (m), 1389 (m), 1358 (s), 1283 (w), 1214 (s), 1168 (w), 1110 (w), 1013 (s), 953 (w), 907 (m), 812 (s), 727 (m), 662 (m).
